//: Note that the linux scripts are for wsl and not true linux since they still reply on spicetify.exe.
name: nord
author: Tetrax-10

scripts.watch: npm run spicetify-set-theme && npm run spicetify-apply && concurrently "npm run spicetify-watch" "npm run watch-ext" "npm run watch-theme" "npm run watch-colors"
scripts.build: npm run spicetify-set-theme && npm run build-ext && npm run build-theme && npm run build-colors && npm run spicetify-apply
scripts.build-local: npm run build-ext:local && npm run build-theme:local && npm run build-colors:local
scripts.watch-ext:win32: for /f "usebackq delims==" %i in (`spicetify path -s folder`) do spicetify-creator --watch --out=%i
scripts.build-ext:win32: for /f "usebackq delims==" %i in (`spicetify path -s folder`) do spicetify-creator --out=%i
scripts.watch-theme:win32: for /f "usebackq delims==" %i in (`spicetify path -s css`) do sass --watch theme/app.scss %i --no-source-map
scripts.watch-theme:linux: sass --watch theme/app.scss "$(spicetify.exe path -s css | xargs --null wslpath)" --no-source-map
scripts.build-theme:win32: for /f "usebackq delims==" %i in (`spicetify path -s css`) do sass theme/app.scss %i --no-source-map --no-error-css
scripts.build-theme:linux: sass theme/app.scss "$(spicetify.exe path -s css | xargs --null wslpath)" --no-source-map --no-error-css
scripts.build-colors:win32: for /f "usebackq delims==" %i in (`spicetify path -s folder`) do copyfiles --flat theme/color.ini %i
scripts.build-colors:linux: copyfiles --flat theme/color.ini "$(spicetify.exe path -s folder | xargs --null wslpath)"
scripts.spicetify-set-theme: spicetify.exe config current_theme Nord color_scheme Spotify -q
